title: Strengthening App Development Competencies: Virtual Reality-Based Surgical Teamwork Enhancement Training

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners apply communication protocols (briefing/debriefing, call-outs, etc.) for surgical team roles with over 80% accuracy in a 360-degree VR simulation.
Learners achieve an average improvement of 5.5 or higher on a 7-point scale in teamwork attitudes based on the T-TAQ questionnaire.
Learners effectively perform teamwork problem-solving scenarios in real surgical environments with over 85% proficiency through paired project evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
